entry.title: Picture You
entry.summary:
Author: harpsichordsandthelit

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 35,752Chapters: 17/21Kudos: 459

Summary: Clark Kent just moved into a new apartment. The building is nice. His neighbors are welcoming. He heard some good things about the guy who lived here before him.And then he received a postcard.  Hey, I used to live in your apartment. I’m drunk in Gotham, and it’s the only address I can think of. Happy Holidays. B. W.  Inspired by this Tumblr post

entry.title: my reflection in your eyes
entry.summary:
Author: jeijeism

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,776Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 65

Summary: His glasses are still perched on his nose, his eyes shut tight—for someone that doesn’t need sleep he sure can knock out fast. Though, it’s endearing how Clark makes it look so easy to be vulnerable. So easy to love. Or, a series of events where 5 times Bruce really likes Clark’s glasses and 1 time Clark likes Bruce in glasses.

entry.title: Gothic Hope
entry.summary:
Author: wysteriadragon777

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,312Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 4

Summary: Bruce Wayne and Clark Kent begin to navigate their growing friendship while secretly knowing each other’s heroic identities. As they form an alliance, they uncover a sinister plot involving Lex Luthor, mysterious crystals affecting Gotham’s criminals, and the arrival of the alien mercenary Lobo, sent by the Sinestro Corps. With a cosmic threat looming and their cities at risk, Batman and Superman must work together to unravel the conspiracy and protect the world from an impending danger... and even confront their growing feelings towards one another.

Author: DiamondBat

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,599Chapters: 4/?Kudos: 49

entry.title: When Alfred’s Away, Bruce Will Play (Adopt)
entry.summary:
Author: Slowly_Falling_Away

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,239Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 224

Summary: As Alfred frowned at him disapprovingly, watching the nine children playing in the foyer, of which only two had been at the manor before the man had taken his three-month vacation, Bruce was ready to admit that he may have a bit of an adoption problem.With Alfred on vacation, Bruce speedruns adoption, and his family grows. Never mind the lack of sleep and increasing chaos, he totally has this. Featuring tired parent Bruce Wayne, smitten Clark Kent, late to the party Dick, good big brother Jason, chaos duo Tim and Steph, down for crime Kon, just chilling Cass, babies Damian and Jon, and confused Duke.

entry.title: 𝑪𝑳𝑶𝑺𝑬 𝑸𝑼𝑨𝑹𝑻𝑬𝑹𝑺 // 𝑨 𝑺𝑼𝑷𝑬𝑹𝑩𝑨𝑻 𝑺𝑻𝑶𝑹𝒀
entry.summary:
Author: battinscnz

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,436Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 155

Summary: Bruce Wayne is no stranger to the spotlight—or the shadows it casts. Reclusive, haunted by tragedy, and heir to a name that carries more weight than comfort, he now faces something far more personal than public scrutiny: a stalker. The letters arrive like clockwork—taunting, obsessive, familiar. And with Halloween approaching—the anniversary of his parents' death—the tension coils tighter.Clark Kent is a disciplined, quietly intense MMA-trained security specialist, brought in under General Sam Lane’s orders to keep Bruce safe. He expects a job. He doesn’t expect the gothic cold of Wayne Manor, the brooding silence of its only resident, or the unsettling depth of what Bruce refuses to say out loud.But as danger creeps closer, and the mystery surrounding the stalker sharpens, Bruce and Clark are forced into uncomfortable proximity. What begins as resistance slowly becomes something deeper—something fragile and real.

entry.title: What Remains When the Monument Falls
entry.summary:
Author: Hasunohana

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,336Chapters: 3/4Kudos: 25

Summary: The Batcave had always held secrets, but none as raw as Jason Todd’s memorial—a shrine of glass and grief, a monument to the son Bruce Wayne had failed.Now, with the Batfamily closer than ever, Bruce decides it’s time to let go of the past. When Jason is summoned to the manor, he braces for the same old cycle of guilt and discord. Instead, he finds his father standing before the memorial, tools in hand, ready to shatter that symbol of pain once and for all.As the glass fractures, Jason is forced to confront the question that’s haunted him since he clawed his way out of the grave:Who is he now——when he’s no longer the dead Robin,—no longer the failed vigilante?

entry.title: For the years to keep on spinning
entry.summary:
Author: ionia

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,801Chapters: 2/10Kudos: 18

Summary: After almost ten years of marriage, Bruce and Clark’s relationship is strained and they're not in sync anymore. Now, with their anniversary coming up, can they bridge the gap? Unfortunately, the only way to make the world's finest take a vacation is to parent trap them into a fake dating and fake mission trip halfway across the world.Unfortunately, Clark finds out about this scheme and now he must navigate the trip with a prickly bathusband, all while trying to salvage their marriage. FYI: Work is finished and will be updated twice a week!
